column1: Palm River-Clair Mel is a census-designated place (CDP) in Hillsborough County
column6: 589 at the 2000 census. The census area includes the unincorporated communities of Clair-Mel City and Palm River. The ZIP code for Palm River-Clair Mel is 33619.

column1: Palm River-Clair Mel is located just west of the geographic center of Hillsborough County at 27°55′41″N 82°22′44″W (27.928150
column3: or approximately 6 miles (10 km) southeast of downtown Tampa. The CDP is bordered to the north and west by the city of Tampa
column6: and to the south by Progress Village. The Palm River forms the northern boundary of the CDP.

column1: U.S. Route 41 runs through the western part of the CDP
column2: leading north into the eastern part of Tampa and south to Gibsonton. U.S. Route 41 Business runs west from US 41 and crosses East Bay/McKay Bay for a more direct route to downtown Tampa. U.S. Route 301 forms the eastern edge of the CDP
column3: running north to East Lake-Orient Park and south to Riverview.

column2: the Palm River-Clair Mel CDP has a total area of 11.7 square miles (30.4 km2)
column3: of which 11.5 square miles (29.9 km2) are land and 0.2 square miles (0.5 km2)
